TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase
Public NotInheritable Class MsmqTransportBindingElement Inherits MsmqBindingElementBase

summary.span: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native Message Queuing (MSMQ) protocol.

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native Message Queuing (MSMQ) protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Das ermöglicht es dem Benutzer, die Eigenschaften des Warteschlangenkommunikationskanals festzulegen.The enables the user to set the properties of the queued communication channel. Der Warteschlangenkommunikationskanal verwendet das Message Queuing für den Transport.The queued communication channel uses Message Queuing for its transport. Dieses Bindungselement ist das Standardbindungselement für das Message Queuing ().This binding element is the default binding element used by the Message Queuing standard binding (). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/service.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BuildChannelFactory(Of TChannel) (context As BindingContext) As IChannelFactory(Of TChannel)

span.span: A or a class.

param.name: context
param.span: The with which to build the channel factory.

span.span: The with which to build the channel factory.

summary.span: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.

span.span: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.

returns.span: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing Message Queuing applications.

span.span: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing Message Queuing applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Eine Kanalfactory wird mit den Eigenschaften erstellt und initialisiert, die im Bindungselement festgelegt wurden.A channel factory is created and initialized using the properties that have been set in the binding element. Anschließend werden Ausgabekanäle mit der initialisierten Kanalfactory erstellt, mit denen Nachrichten an eine Nachrichtenwarteschlange gesendet werden können.The initialized channel factory is then used to create output channels that can be used to send messages to a message queue. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

span.span: The context value is null.

exception.span: The TChannel is not IOutputChannel or IOutputSessionChannel.

span.span: The TChannel is not IOutputChannel or IOutputSessionChannel.

exception.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is EncryptAndSign and UseActiveDirectory is false.

span.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is EncryptAndSign and UseActiveDirectory is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxPoolSize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxPoolSize
Public Property MaxPoolSize As Integer
public: property int MaxPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing (MSMQ) message objects.

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing (MSMQ) message objects.

value.span: Eine ganze Zahl, die die maximale Größe des Pools angibt, der interne Message Queuing-Nachrichtenobjekte enthält.

span.span: An integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing message objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Mit dem internen Message Queuing-Nachrichtenobjektpool werden Allokationen dieser Objekte beim Senden und Empfangen von Nachrichten vermieden.The internal Message Queuing message object pool is used to avoid allocations of these objects when sending and receiving messages. Die maximale Poolgröße ist ein Parameter zur Optimierung der Leistung.The maximum pool size is a performance-tuning parameter. Der Standardwert ist 8.The default value is 8. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

exception.span: The value is less than zero.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

Public Property QueueTransferProtocol As QueueTransferProtocol
public: property System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol QueueTransferProtocol { System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

value.span: Ein -Enumerationswert, der den für die Nachrichtenzustellung zwischen Warteschlangen-Managern verwendeten Transporttyp angibt.

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the transport used for message delivery between queue managers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Active Directory-Adressierung wird bei Verwendung von SRMP (SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol) vom Message Queuing (MSMQ) nicht unterstützt. sollte daher nicht auf oder festgelegt werden, wenn auf `true` festgelegt ist.Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP), so do not set to or when is set to `true`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

exception.span: The value is not one of the values.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Scheme { get; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Returns a that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

span.span: Returns a that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

value.span: Ein , der das Adressierungsschema für dieses Transportbindungselement enthält.

span.span: A that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die -Eigenschaft gibt die Zeichenfolge "net.msmq" zurück.The property returns the string "net.msmq". Der Message Queuing (MSMQ)-Warteschlangentransport unterstützt mehrere Adressierungsschemas einschließlich net.msmq.The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queued transport supports several addressing schemes, including net.msmq. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseActiveDirectory { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseActiveDirectory
Public Property UseActiveDirectory As Boolean
public: property bool UseActiveDirectory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

value.span: , wenn Warteschlangenadressen mit Active Directory konvertiert werden sollen, andernfalls .

span.span: if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Message Queuing (MSMQ)-Warteschlangenadressen können aus Pfadnamen oder direkten Formatnamen bestehen.Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names. Bei direkten Formatnamen wird der Warteschlangenname von MSMQ mit DNS, NetBIOS oder IP aufgelöst.With a direct format name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. Bei Pfadnamen wird der Warteschlangenname von MSMQ mit Active Directory aufgelöst.With a path name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using Active Directory. Die URI einer Nachrichtenwarteschlange wird vom [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]-Wartenschlangentransport standardmäßig in einen direkten Formatnamen konvertiert.By default, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name. Durch Festlegen der -Eigenschaft auf `true` kann von einer Anwendung angegeben werden, dass der Computername vom Warteschlangentransport mit Active Directory anstelle von DNS, NetBIOS oder IP aufgelöst werden soll.By setting the property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the computer name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#5)]
